sectionNotes: Restricted to Computer Engineering or Computer Science or Electrical Engineering or Engineering Mechanics or Engineering Physics or General Engineering or Industrial Engineering or Mechanical Engineering or Physics or Chemical Engineering or Statistics or Statistics & Computer Science or Math & Computer Science major(s).
sectionText: During early registration, Math 415 is restricted to majors specifically requiring the course.  Restrictions will be removed during the business day on November 28, 2016.  Students not already in those majors are welcome to register as soon as the restrictions have been removed.
